paper_abstract: In this paper, we map an arbitrary algebra to a completely distributive lattice and define algebras of fuzzy sets. When the algebra is a term algebra, we obtain fuzzy tree languages. After defining fuzzy equational sets, fuzzy rational sets and fuzzy recognizable tree languages, we derive a "Kleene theorem" for fuzzy tree languages. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
